tiles.title: Our Mission
tiles.description: Our mission is to support and develop children's strengths and potential through a child-centered, emergent, collaborative teaching and learning environment inspired by nature and driven by children and families.

tiles.title: Children are valued
tiles.description: Children are valued for their ability to do meaningful work, their wonder and curiosities, and their need to play.

tiles.title: Families are valued
tiles.description: Parents and families are valued for their bonds and traditions, their commitment to work, home, community and their dreams for their children.
